channel.title: Crash in 'Forget Freeman'
channel.description:
Had experienced no problems with this awesome game. Now crashes every time in the same spot - top of the walkway of Coolant System 1 after killing a couple of vortigaunts, and making my way to a ladder to cross to the other side.
Anyone else experience similar? Windows 7, Quad Core i5-2400 3.10 Ghz CPU with Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti.
Thanks.
